title: The Story of Henry Handel Richardson
abstract: A potted life history of Ethel Florence Lyndsey Richardson.
description: This animated short was highly commended in the "Create a Stamp Story" section of the Screen It! competition. Henry Handel Richardson was the pseudonym of Ethel Florence Lyndsey Richardson; this stamp story is about her achievements in music and literature.  An animated short entered to "Create a Stamp Story" section of ACMI's 'Screen It' media making competition for Primary Schools.
related_objects: Collection; B1006088; Screen It 2004; Active; 01 Jan 2005-30 Apr 2005
